Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about the help files, <font face="courier new">HelpProvider</font> component, pop-up help, and <font face="courier new">ToolTip</font> component are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: HTML Help workshop allows you to create Table of Contents with .hhc extension.
The New Project – Destination page of HTML Help Workshop allows you to specify the path to save the help file.
The <font face="courier new">HelpNamespace</font> property of Help class specifies the component of a help file to be displayed.

The <font face="courier new">HelpButton</font> property of <font face="courier new">Form</font> class supports the <font face="courier new">MinimizeBox</font> property of the <font face="courier new">Form</font> class.
The <font face="courier new">GetToolTip()</font> method of <font face="courier new">ToolTip</font> class fetches the control for which the tool tip is displayed.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(True), (C)-(False), (D)-(False), and (E)-(False).
